description.ko: 심해의 압력과 발견되지 않은 생물 발광 생명체의 매혹적인 빛, 그리고 가라앉은 고대의 신비가 만나는 AQUA-5 구역의 조용한 심연으로 여행을 떠나보세요.
description.en: Journey into the silent depths of the AQUA-5 zone, where the pressure of the deep ocean meets the mesmerizing glow of undiscovered bioluminescent life forms and sunken ancient mysteries.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of the deep ocean abyss, ethereal bioluminescent flora and fauna glowing in neon cyan and violet, high-pressure underwater environment with shimmering particles, ancient stone ruins partially buried in the seabed, realistic water distortion, 8k resolution, volumetric lighting, mysterious and serene atmosphere.
